value.title: StarCraft 2: AI vs AI - Epic Pro Bots Tournament Match!

This match does not feature two humans that play against each other, instead it is a game between two custom made AIs (artificial intelligence). value.title: Reynor's UNEXPECTED Sky Toss Switches vs Scarlett! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of top level StarCraft 2 between Reynor and Scarlett. In this series Reynor decides to play Protoss, rather than make this a Zerg versus Zerg. value.title: Serral vs MaxPax - The Late Game KING! (StarCraft 2)
value.excerpt: Top level series of StarCraft 2 between Serral and MaxPax, two of the very best players in the game currently. Game one of this best-of-5 goes the distance. value.title: StarCraft 2: CRAZY GAMES - 1v1 with Co-op Commanders!
